articles.author: Sophia Tareen, Melissa Perez Winder
articles.title: Jury begins deliberations in trial of Illinois landlord charged with murdering Muslim boy - The Associated Press
articles.description: A jury has found a 73-year-old Illinois landlord guilty in a hate crime attack that left a Palestinian American boy dead and injured his mother. Joseph Czuba faced murder, attempted murder and hate crime charges in the death of Wadee Alfayoumi and the woundin…
articles.content:
JOLIET, Ill. (AP) A jury found an Illinois landlord guilty of murder and hate crime charges Friday for a brutal 2023 attack on a Palestinian American family that killed a 6-year-old.
Joseph Czuba, 7… [+4452 chars]
